channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Tensions flare in Minnesota as protesters and federal agents repeatedly square off
item.description: Days of demonstrations against immigration agents and a new lawsuit have left Minnesota tense. Federal authorities used tear gas on Monday to break up crowds of whistle-blowing activists.

item.title: US carbon pollution rose in 2025. Experts blame cold winter, high natural gas prices, data centers
New video shows the minutes before immigration officer fatally shoots woman in Minneapolis
